description: Manual platform update domain walk to update virtual machines in a service fabric virtual machine scale set.

platform_update_domain.description: The platform update domain for which a manual recovery walk is requested

nextplatformupdatedomain.description: The next update domain that needs to be walked. Null means walk spanning all update domains has been completed

walkperformed.description: Whether the recovery walk was performed

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

vm_scale_set_name.description: The name of the VM scale set.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
